Tis monaxias mou tis stoes monachos perpatao
O dromos einai makrynos ki opou me pas tha pao
Me stavroses, me matoses ki as pethaina gia sena
To dakry mou eree san aima, logia xechasmena
Pisteva pos oi angeloi zoune sta oneira mas
Psemata omos pisteva vriskontai anamesa mas
Mia poli erimi i kardia san efyges makria mou
Gyrna xana se kartero, asteri kai chara mou
Ston kipo tis agapis mas, piga gia na se psaxo
Sto plithos omos chathikes, den boresa na klapso
To stavrodromi tis psychis ki o mystikos mas deipnos
Chathikane sto diava sou, ekleise pia o kyklos
San angelos s’ agapisa, gyrna stin ankalia mou
Pes mou kai palin m’ agapas, lytrose tin kardia mou
